attr.title: Legend of Xenia
attr.desc:
Legend of Xenia is a retro-inspired, open-world Zelda-like with a resolution of just 64x64 pixels. Take control of a young girl who wakes up on an island...with no memories of her past or how she got there...
 +Explore the island
 + Fight lots of baddies
 + Meet new friends
 + Uncover your past
attr.inst:
Download the windows version of the game from https://baku.itch.io/legend-of-xenia and extract the contents of the exe file (open with 7-zip) to /ports/LegendofXenia/gamedata
 The files D3DX9_43.dll and LowRezJam2016.exe are not needed.
